creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two-piece round pagoda with four disk-like sections; spindly finial sits on top; white pigment fragments
medium: Sutra: ink printed on paper; Pagoda: Japanese cypress (hinoki) and Cleyera ochnacea japonica (sakaki)
title: Pagoda with Darani sutra, from a set of One Million Pagodas
